name: 30 minute Helicopter Trial Lesson
description:
The adventure starts with a talk on the plan for the flight. This includes a few pointers on the helicopter and how it works to give you a better understanding.

Then it's time to get strapped in for lift off!

Once up in the air and at a safe height, we will go through the 3 main helicopter controls one by one. When you are comfortable you will get to climb, descend and bank the aircraft. Then back to the airfield to do what helicopters do best â€“ hovering.

At the end of your experience, we can give you a certificate as proof of your achievement. The flight can even be used as a start towards a Private Pilot Licence. Want to share this moment with family? Why not bring them along to watch and take photos?

Gift Vouchers are a perfect idea for that special someone and can be posted to you, first class. Bookings can be taken for a specific date or left open, as the voucher is valid for 6 months after purchase. Booking details are included in the gift voucher pack. Vouchers are transferable by arrangement.
